mapper.select: select BTMGoal.BGoalTitle as "bGoalTitle",to_char(BTMRecord.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", to_char(BTMRecord.endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endDate" from BTMGoal inner join BTMRecord on BTMGoal.bGoalNum = BTMRecord.bGoalNum where BTMRecord.memberId = #{userid} order by BTMRecord.startDate desc
